medications.name: Paracetamol
medications.dosage: 500-1000mg every 4-6 hours as needed, not to exceed 4 grams in 24 hours
medications.notes: Common side effects to watch for: stomach upset, rash, allergic reactions

medications.name: Ibuprofen
medications.dosage: 200-400mg every 4-6 hours as needed, not to exceed 1.2 grams in 24 hours
medications.notes: Common side effects to watch for: stomach upset, nausea, diarrhea
